```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
atp <- read_csv(here::here("esselt21/tennis_module/exploration/atp_2023.csv"))
```

```{r}
matches <-
  atp |>
  group_by(player) |>
  summarise(matches = n()) |>
  filter(matches >= 10) |>
  pull(player)
```

```{r}
atp <-
  atp |>
  filter(player %in% matches)
```


```{r}
GS <-
  atp |>
  filter(best_of != 3) |>
  select(-best_of)

nGS <-
  atp |>
  filter(best_of == 3) |>
  select(-best_of)
```

```{r}
winPercentage <-
  atp |>
  group_by(player, surface) |>
  summarise(winPct = mean(result == "Winner"),
            matches = n()) |>
  filter(matches >= 5) |>
  mutate(surface = as_factor(surface),
         surface = fct_relevel(surface, c("Clay", "Grass", "Hard")))

GSwinPercentage <-
  GS |>
  group_by(player, surface) |>
  summarise(winPct = mean(result == "Winner"),
            matches = n()) |>
  filter(matches >= 5) |>
  mutate(surface = as_factor(surface),
         surface = fct_relevel(surface, c("Clay", "Grass", "Hard")))

nGSwinPercentage <-
  nGS |>
  group_by(player, surface) |>
  summarise(winPct = mean(result == "Winner"),
            matches = n()) |>
  filter(matches >= 5) |>
  mutate(surface = as_factor(surface),
         surface = fct_relevel(surface, c("Clay", "Grass", "Hard")))
```

```{r}
winPercentage |>
  ggplot(aes(x = surface,
             y = winPct,
             fill = surface)) +
  stat_boxplot(geom = 'errorbar') +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = 'ivory'),
        plot.background = element_rect(fill = 'ivory'),
        plot.title = element_text(size = 20),
        plot.caption = element_text(size = 20,
                                    face = 'bold'),
        legend.position = 'none') +
  labs(x = 'Surface',
       y = 'Win Percentage',
       title = 'Side-by-side Box Plots of Win Percentage',
       caption = 'ATP')

nGSwinPercentage |>
  ggplot(aes(x = surface,
             y = winPct,
             fill = surface)) +
  geom_boxplot(alpha = 0.75) +
  theme_minimal()

GSwinPercentage |>
  ggplot(aes(x = surface,
             y = winPct,
             fill = surface)) +
  geom_boxplot(alpha = 0.75) +
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
winPercentage |>
  ggplot(aes(x = winPct,
             y = after_stat(density))) +
  geom_histogram(fill = 'lightblue',
                 color = 'black',
                 bins = 15) +
  facet_grid(~surface) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = 'ivory'),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = 'ivory'),
        strip.background = element_rect(colour = 'black',
                                        fill = 'gray90'),
        strip.text = element_text(size = 15,
                                  face = 'bold'),
        plot.caption = element_text(size = 20,
                                    face = 'bold'),
        plot.title = element_text(size = 20)) +
  labs(x = 'Win Percentage',
       y = 'Density',
       title = 'Histogram of Win Percentages by Surface',
       caption = "ATP")
```
